How could that girl with glasses see during the rain? I used to play a lot in rain when I was a kid but can't anymore bc of glasses

"I used to play a lot in rain when I was a kid..."- There is your answer. The more you grow up, the more logical limitations you place on yourself. I started wearing them, cosmetically, in middle school to use the stigma they once carried, to be avoided by the "popular". Wearing them rain or shine, alone or around others; they are a comfort that is very noticed without.
